detail.installNote: This skill will be added to your account. You can customize the skill's settings after installation.

missingIdentifier.title: Missing Skill Identifier
missingIdentifier.description: No skill identifier was provided. Please use a valid install link from the marketplace.

notFound.title: Skill Not Found
notFound.description: The requested skill could not be found in the marketplace. It may have been removed or unpublished.

fetchFailed.title: Unable to Load Skill
fetchFailed.description: Could not load skill details from the marketplace. Please try again later.

error.unavailable: The marketplace is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
error.generic: Something went wrong while installing the skill. Please try again.
